Title: Give it a Grow Wigan
Schedule: Every other Wednesday & Last Sunday of the Month
Description: Join us for gardening together sessions three times a month at St Anne's Community Garden in Beech Hill, where everyone is welcome. We host sessions every other Wednesday from 10 am and the last Sunday of the month from 12 pm. These sessions are always…
Location: 152 Beech Hill Ave, Wigan, Greater Manchester, WN6 7TA

Title: Golborne in Bloom
Description: We meet Thursdays and Saturdays 9am-12pm at Golborne library (weather permitting). We are a group of volunteers maintaining 6 pocket gardens in Golborne Centre including the heritage site known as Peter Kane Square, the front and rear of Golborne Library, Tanners Lane Embankment and the…

Title: Lowton Hedgehog Rescue
Description: Lowton Hedgehog Rescue was created in order to provide an animal welfare service for hedgehogs which are now classed as Vulnerable on the Endangered Species List for the UK.   The rescue takes in sick and injured hedgehogs from members of the public and local vets. …

Title: Wigan Flashes Conservation and Community Group
Description: Wigan Flashes Nature Reserve is part of  the Flashes of Wigan and Leigh National Nature Reserve.  Our group works closely with Lancashire Wildlife Trust to help maintain and improve Wigan Flashes Nature Reserve for both wildlife and the public. We help with events to promote…
